spec.currency: This is the currency the card would be denominated in
spec.amount: This is the amount to prefund the card with on card creation
spec.billing_name: This is the Name on the card
spec.billing_address: This is the registered address for the card. e.g. Your house address where you would receive your card statements
spec.billing_city: This is the City / District / Suburb / Town / Village. registered for the card
spec.billing_state: This is the State / County / Province / Region
spec.billing_country: Billing address country code, if provided. (e.g. "NG", "US")
spec.callback_url: This is a callback endpoint you provide where we send actions that happen on a card such as a card being charged, a card being terminated etc
